title: CapRiders: Euro Soccer
notes: Steam reviews are Positive (86% of 15). SteamDB shows 74.51% positive (21 reviews); blended score reflects small but favorable sample. Steam store lists 15 reviews and supports up to 8 gamepads or iOS/Android phones as controllers on the same screen.
raw_comment: Local multiplayer soccer game with unusual ball control mechanic. Gamepads or Android/iOS phones as controllers. Up to 8 players, same screen.
